short_summary: Maintenance and repair of motors and fluid pumps
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) Real Properties Operations Unit (West) Section Edmonton (RPOU(W) Sect EDM) is responsible for the servicing and repair of electric motors, and fluid pumps within RPOU(W) Sect EDM area of responsibility. This area includes, but is not limited to, CFB Edmonton, Cardiff, Riverbend and Jarvis Lake. Work under this Standing Offer covers the supply of all labour, equipment, material, transportation and supervision required to carry out servicing, repairs and/or replacement of all fluid pumps and electric motors located in all infrastructure that falls within RPOU(W) Sect Edm's area of responsibility. The majority of the work will be concentrated at CFB Edmonton.

full_summary:
###  Maintenance and Repair of Motors and Fluid Pumps

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3756430561-Doc3756480144
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3756430561
* **Publication Date:** November 24, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2022 @ 2:00 PM MST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** NA
* **Expected Contract End Date:** November 17, 2023
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Summary

The Department of National Defence (DND) Real Properties Operations Unit (West) Section Edmonton (RPOU(W) Sect EDM) wishes to establish a Standing Offer for the maintenance and repair of electric motors, and fluid pumps within its area of responsibility. The scope of work includes the supply of all necessary labour, equipment, material, transportation, and supervision to perform servicing, repairs, and/or replacements of all fluid pumps and electric motors located in all infrastructure within RPOU(W) Sect Edm’s area of responsibility.

#### Key Information

* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Edmonton
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Officer:**
	+ Name: Matthew Virakorn (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: NA
	+ Fax: NA

#### Documents and Attachments

None attached.
